chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
x: pos n
i: nat
u: nat
k: nat
v: Vector.t nat n
j: nat
w: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec
Notation pos := Fin.t
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
mm_sss_INC_inv : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[(S (v#>x))/x]
in_mm_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])
in_mma_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])
mm_sss_fun : forall (i : mm_instr (pos n)) (s t1 t2 : mm_state n), i // s -1> t1 -> i // s -1> t2 -> t1 = t2
plus_is_one : forall m n : nat, m + n = 1 -> {m = 0 /\ n = 1} + {m = 1 /\ n = 0}
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
VectorEq.cast : vec ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- Type] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w0 : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w0) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]
in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p + ?m) -> pos (p + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
subcode_snoc_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
Inductive mma_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n ->...-> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x]) Arguments mma_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n ->...-> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
subcode_cons_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (J : X) (Q : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, J :: Q) -> i = j /\ I = J \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (S j, Q)
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]
subcode_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l r : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
subcode_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a r : list X), j = i -> (i, a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
vec_plus_assoc : forall (n : nat) (u v w : vec nat n), vec_plus u (vec_plus v w) = vec_plus (vec_plus u v) w
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n k : nat u : nat i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n |- nat]

```coq
intros.
inversion H0.
subst.
rewrite H1 in H.
injection H; intros.
split; auto.
rewrite <- H3.
f_equal.
apply in_mm_sss_dec_1; auto.
Qed.

original: intros. inversion H0. subst. rewrite H1 in H. injection H; intros. split; auto. rewrite <- H3. f_equal. apply in_mm_sss_dec_1; auto.
